mapper.select: SELECT DATE(o.o_datetime) as orderDate, COUNT(DISTINCT o.o_id) as orderCount, SUM(o.total_price) as totalSales FROM orders o WHERE (#{startDate} IS NULL OR o.o_datetime >= #{startDate}) AND (#{endDate} IS NULL OR o.o_datetime <= #{endDate}) GROUP BY DATE(o.o_datetime) ORDER BY orderDate

WITH RECURSIVE CategoryHierarchy AS ( -- 초기 선택: 최하위 카테고리부터 시작 SELECT c1.category_id, c1.category_name, c1.parent_id, CAST(c1.category_name AS CHAR(1000)) as category_name_path, CAST(c1.category_id AS CHAR(1000)) as category_id_path, 1 as level FROM category c1 WHERE c1.category_id IN ( SELECT p.category_id FROM product p )
UNION ALL
-- 재귀: 상위 카테고리로 이동하며 경로 구성 SELECT c2.category_id, c2.category_name, c2.parent_id, CONCAT(c2.category_name, ' > ', ch.category_name_path), CONCAT(c2.category_id, ',', ch.category_id_path), ch.level + 1 FROM category c2 INNER JOIN CategoryHierarchy ch ON ch.parent_id = c2.category_id ), FullPath AS ( SELECT ch.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY ch.category_id ORDER BY ch.level DESC ) as rn FROM CategoryHierarchy ch ) SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, fp.category_name_path, IFNULL(SUM(od.od_count), 0) as totalQuantity, IFNULL(SUM(od.od_price), 0) as totalAmount, COALESCE(AVG(r.r_score), 0) as avgRating, RANK() OVER (ORDER BY IFNULL(SUM(od.od_price), 0) DESC) as rank FROM product p JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.category_id JOIN FullPath fp ON c.category_id = fp.category_id AND fp.rn = 1 LEFT JOIN order_detail od ON p.p_id = od.p_id LEFT JOIN orders o ON od.o_id = o.o_id LEFT JOIN review r ON p.p_id = r.p_id
AND o.o_datetime >= #{startDate}
AND o.o_datetime <= #{endDate}
AND ( c.category_id = #{categoryId} OR c.parent_id = #{categoryId} OR fp.category_id_path LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{categoryId}, ',%') )
GROUP BY p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, fp.category_name_path, fp.level ORDER BY totalAmount DESC, p.p_name

SELECT p.p_name, SUM(od.od_count) as totalQuantity, SUM(od.od_price) as totalAmount FROM orders o JOIN order_detail od ON o.o_id = od.o_id JOIN product p ON od.p_id = p.p_id WHERE (#{startDate} IS NULL OR o.o_datetime >= #{startDate}) AND (#{endDate} IS NULL OR o.o_datetime <= #{endDate}) GROUP BY p.p_id ORDER BY totalAmount DESC LIMIT 10

SELECT DATE(o.o_datetime) as orderDate, COUNT(DISTINCT o.o_id) as orderCount, AVG(o.total_price) as avgOrderAmount FROM orders o WHERE (#{startDate} IS NULL OR o.o_datetime >= #{startDate}) AND (#{endDate} IS NULL OR o.o_datetime <= #{endDate}) GROUP BY DATE(o.o_datetime) ORDER BY orderDate
